rules.description: Maps button 3 to paste only on ghostty
Remap Command+e to Command+Shift+c in slack
Send Eisu/Kana key when command key is pressed alone. (Left command key is Eisu, right command key is Kana) (rev 2)
⌘ as option in terminal (This is not valid because the first rule ignore this rule)
eisu as command in not terminal
Map Control+Option+Arrow to Control+Command+Arrow on Ghostty (for Muhenkan+Ctrl+Arrow)
Map command, option and Japanese eisuu to meta-key on Ghostty Terminal
